name: Tumblr ~ All black!
description:
Just Tumblr, but then in a black outfit
_________________________________________________

IF THERE IS ANY KIND OF WEIRD BUG AND IT STYLISH WILL STILL SHOW THE ORIGINAL TUMBLR THEME TRY TURNING THE STYLISH EXTENSION OFF AND ON
additional_info:
v1.7.6
Added Tumblr messaging support. This was a small fix, no nothing extra is done.

v1.7.5
changed a few things which you see when you're really deep into tumblr

v1.7.4
Once again tumblr had a small update

v1.7.3
Small tumblr updates

v1.7.2
Tumblr updates

v1.7.1.1
bug fixes

v1.7.1
Tumblr had updates

v1.7.0.4
I hate regex.

v1.7.0.3
Small update

v1.7.0.2
Small update

v1.7.0.1 oops forgot a lil thingey

v1.7
Tumblr had a huge update.
I should clean my code stuff sometime.

v1.6.4.7
Tumblr had a small update.

v1.6.4.6
Tweaking and small update.

v1.6.4.5
Small updates.

v1.6.4.5
Finding out you've missed stuff is always annoying.

v1.6.4.3
Fixed some lilshit thingeys that annoyed the fuck out of me.

v1.6.4.2
Tumblr had updates again.

v1.6.4.1
Fixed the search page.

v1.6.4
Tumblr had HTML updates. Luckily I've noticed it.
Everything is fixed by now.

v1.6.3.6
Small updates.

v1.6.3.5
Small updates.

v1.6.3
I've found out I've that for some people my theme wasn't working. The reason behind that is because tumblr had the option if you want to browse safe. I wasn't aware for that option and a lot of things for my theme were only working for http:// websites. Not https:// websites.
So I've changed everything now and things should work by now :D

v1.6.2
Holy shit, found out I've missed a lot of things!!!
But it's finished now. So have fun Tumblering in black again!

v1.6.1
Finally managed to fix some small issues that were irritating me. 
Oh and Tumblr had some updates with their css, so I also had an update.

v1.6.0
So yeah, the six should mean a big update. To be honest it's not. I just ran out of numbers.
It's not like I can just keep doing things like 1.5.90001, 1.5.90002, ect.
So yeah, just small bugfixes. I believe I've still missed some, but that's okay for now.

v1.5.9
Updates, updates, updates...

v1.5.8
Added the autorization page for apps.

v1.5.7.5
Fixed a really small thing I've found. Took me 20 sec so that's why it's an small update.

v1.5.7
Saw Tumblr had an update, so I also had an update.

v1.5.6
Found out I forgot the drafts page. I just never use that part of Tumblr. Sorry.

v1.5.5
Found some things that I didn't fix. Also made the register button black.

v1.5.4
Finally managed to fix that damn toaster.

v1.5.3 
Changed the hover color from the searchbar, whe reblog page and when ur at the activity page you're friends also have a black background.

v1.5.2
fixed the notification popups.

v1.5.1
The Tumblr and web tabs in the search bar weren't really that optimized. 
They have a better visual now.

v1.5
Tumblr had an update, so I needed to update. New version, with some 'improvements'. It's how you like to call it.

v1.4.6
Changed the background for the que settings. Personally I think this (It has a black background now instead of gray.) fits the theme better.

v1.4.5
code cleanup and fixes some various bugs.

v1.4.4
fixed a small bug with some tags.

v1.4.3
Whenever you post something it will have a blueish background, I've changed it to black now.

v1.4.2
fixed some small bugs.

v1.4.1
found a lil bug when you click on a tumblr link from an email you won't have the style installed. Got it working now.

V1.4.0
Found a big with ask boxes. Got it fixed, but it took me a while.
Apart from that I've fixed some more bugs I've found, so that's why I jump from v1.3.3 to v1.4.0

V1.3.3
Added the reblog page itself. 
And fixed some other little things.

V1.3.2
Also fixed the "Send fan mail" button.
I've also added some screenshots. The tumblr url's and picture have been filled up due to privacy reasons.
The dashboard, posts and likes pages are technically all the same throughout their style. So I only have one screenshot from that. 
I wish I could put in some more screenshots, but unfortunately I can't. Sorry for that.

v1.3.1
I've found out I've forgotten the Fanmail button.
Fixed it now.

v1.3.0
Fixed the entire API page and some more bugs.

v1.2.8
Completely fixed the search page. 
This actually took me a lot of time.

v1.2.65
Fixed 1 element from the search page.

v1.2.6
Fixed the members page and background from the reblog post page.

v1.2.6
Added the search page.

v1.2.4
Fixed the button on the reblog post page.

V1.2.3
I've accidently removed the version list...
So yeah.

Everything I can think of is fixed. If you manage to find any 'bugs' just comment on my style.
